channel.title: Trade scamming? glitch
channel.description:
I found a scam glitch does anyone no how to stop it this is how it works
you trade somone money say your paying a phat or somthing you press accept and than you right click the stuff you have i so you can see remove 1 and stuff and than the other person presses accept and bam you still have the remove item window up so you click remove 1 and the item goes back to your box and it says its still in the trade and the other person trades and than you have your item and there item and they got nothing.

item.title: Trade scamming? glitch
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

idk if theres a fix but, sometimes staking, doesnt give you your prize, and similiar bugs but eventually someone will get bored and fix it, until then dont trade or stake

Read full topic
